testcase.classname: User should be able to register
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to register page.............................................passed When User choose gender.....................................................passed And User should enter "First Name" and "Last Name"..........................passed And User should enter BirthDate.............................................passed And User should enter Email and Company.....................................passed And User should enter Password and Confirm Password.........................passed And click register button...................................................passed Then display register confirmation message..................................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into website..............................................passed When User choose item and add to cart.......................................passed And Accept the term and click Checkout......................................passed And fill checkout data......................................................passed And choose Shipping Method..................................................passed And choose Payment Method...................................................passed And read Payment information................................................passed And confirm payment.........................................................passed Then confirm order message should be display................................passed
